edu.wpi.grip.core.sources

Class CameraSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.grip.core.Source
      • edu.wpi.grip.core.sources.CameraSource

  • public class CameraSource
extends Source
    Provides a way to generate a constantly updated opencv_core.Mat from a camera

        public java.lang.String getName()

        getName in class Source
        Returns:
        The name of this source. This is used by the GUI to distinguish different sources. For example, ImageFileSource returns the filename of the image.
